project.description: Build an ami from a fork(s) of the openshift source

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: FORK_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The default fork id to use for all repos. Note: If you only want to use a fork for 1 of the repos then use that ${REPO}_FORK_ID instead.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LI_FORK_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The fork id to use for the li repo. Will use FORK_ID followed by 'openshift' if not specified.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: LI_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch to use for li fork

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CRANKCASE_FORK_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The fork id to use for the crankcase repo. Will use FORK_ID followed by 'openshift' if not specified.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CRANKCASE_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch to use for crankcase fork

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_FORK_ID
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The fork id to use for the rhc repo. Will use FORK_ID followed by 'openshift' if not specified.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RHC_BRANCH
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch to use for rhc fork

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: AMI_POSTFIX
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: The postfix to add to the ami name => fork_ami_${AMI_POSTFIX}_${BUILD_NUMBER} Usually would be the feature name or something to indicate the purpose of the ami. Only 1 ami per postfix is kept.

hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
if [ -n "$FORK_ID" ] then if [ -z "$LI_FORK_ID" ] then LI_FORK_ID=$FORK_ID fi if [ -z "$CRANKCASE_FORK_ID" ] then CRANKCASE_FORK_ID=$FORK_ID fi if [ -z "$RHC_FORK_ID" ] then RHC_FORK_ID=$FORK_ID fi else if [ -z "$LI_FORK_ID" ] then LI_FORK_ID=openshift fi if [ -z "$CRANKCASE_FORK_ID" ] then CRANKCASE_FORK_ID=openshift fi if [ -z "$RHC_FORK_ID" ] then RHC_FORK_ID=openshift fi fi
if [ -n "$AMI_POSTFIX" ] then TAG_NAME=fork_ami_${AMI_POSTFIX} elif [ -n "$FORK_ID" ] then TAG_NAME=fork_ami_${FORK_ID} elif [ -n "$LI_FORK_ID" ] then TAG_NAME=fork_ami_${LI_FORK_ID} elif [ -n "$CRANKCASE_FORK_ID" ] then TAG_NAME=fork_ami_${CRANKCASE_FORK_ID} elif [ -n "$RHC_FORK_ID" ] then TAG_NAME=fork_ami_${RHC_FORK_ID} else TAG_NAME=fork_ami_openshift fi
rm -rf li rhc crankcase git clone git@github.com:${LI_FORK_ID}/li.git pushd li if [ -n "$LI_BRANCH" ] then git checkout $LI_BRANCH fi popd git clone git@github.com:${CRANKCASE_FORK_ID}/crankcase.git pushd crankcase if [ -n "$CRANKCASE_BRANCH" ] then git checkout $CRANKCASE_BRANCH fi popd git clone git@github.com:${RHC_FORK_ID}/rhc.git pushd rhc if [ -n "$RHC_BRANCH" ] then git checkout $RHC_BRANCH fi popd
pushd li build/devenv build ${TAG_NAME} ${BUILD_NUMBER} --register --official --terminate --install_from_local_source --instance_type m1.large popd
